router_header_2_0.context_grounding: [paste facts/links/notes]. Cite sources if summarizing; don't invent.
router_header_2_0.output_contract: [exact format/schema; if JSON, include a schema].
router_header_2_0.tool_grants: You may use internal reasoning, code execution, and structured output. Do not expose chain-of-thought; return only final results.
router_header_2_0.mode: Choose 'fast' for simple tasks, 'deep' for complex ones; state the choice on one line before the output.
router_header_2_0.self_check: Validate constraints, factuality (vs. sources), and format before returning. If JSON, ensure it parses.
router_header_2_0.failure_policy: If blocked or context is thin, list missing info and ask 3 sharp questions; otherwise proceed with explicit assumptions labeled 'Assumptions'.

prompts.name: Executive Summary (Any Topic)
prompts.prompt:
Create exactly 5 one-line bullets summarizing [topic/brief].
Each bullet starts with a label: What matters, Why now, Risks, Decision, Next actions.
Limit 12 words per bullet. Include 1 source or metric if available.
Mode: [fast/deep]. Return as a simple bullet list — no preamble.
prompts.use_when: You need crisp, executive-level clarity in 30–90 seconds.

prompts.name: Meeting → Decisions
prompts.prompt:
Convert these notes: [paste] into:
A) Decisions list (decision, owner, rationale, date);
B) Actions table {owner, step, due, status ∈ [New, In-Progress, Blocked, Done]}.
Mode: [fast/deep]. No commentary, just the two sections.
prompts.use_when: Converting raw meeting notes into what matters.

prompts.name: Cold Email Trio
prompts.prompt:
Write 3 cold emails for [offer] to [ICP].
Email 1: name the patterned pain; end with a 10-min micro-ask.
Email 2: social proof/insight (number/metric), 1-sentence case study.
Email 3: crisp ask with 2 time options.
Each ≤120 words, 5–7 sentences. Include a {First-line personalization} placeholder.
Mode: [fast/deep].

prompts.name: X Post (Bold, No Hashtags)
prompts.prompt: Write one confident X post on [insight/news]. ≤240 characters.\nFormat: HOOK — TAKEAWAY. Include one concrete fact or number.\nNo hashtags. No emoji at the end. Mode: [fast/deep].

prompts.name: Strict JSON Every Time
prompts.prompt:
Return only valid JSON for [task]. Use this schema:
{
  "title": "string",
  "summary": "string",
  "risks": ["string"],
  "actions": [ { "owner": "string", "step": "string", "eta": "YYYY-MM-DD" } ],
  "metrics": ["string"]
}
No prose. Validate keys, types, and date format before returning.
